name: Pixel Ninja Temple
description:
Pixel Ninja Temple one of the most difficult platformer games where you need to be like a ninja to overcome all levels!

Our hero loves to find ancient treasures but in his last search was trapped in a giant temple full of traps. Just getting the mystical gems will be able to pick up the treasure and get out of the temple.

Arm yourself with courage and skill and reflexes help him overcome the impossible mission in this retro game made with pixel art.

- 40 levels spread over 4 world.

- 4 gems to collect

- Numerous dangers jump and dodge.

- Graphics pixel art.
